{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = AC3150 Dual-band Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.phicomm.com/us/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/121.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Phicomm |model = K3 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (A1/A2/B1/C1) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC3150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = YJYK3 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 800002240, 800002369, 800002397 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4709C0;BCM4709C0KFEBG, UT1719 P10, 01U-04 Z1 W; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex A9 |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9F1G08U0F-SCB0; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM6GE16EWXD-12H; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = PCIe, USB 3.0, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = LCD display, |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2623L;SKY, 2623L, 605EF;;4; ,,, 2.4GHz SPDT Switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85201-11;SKY1, 5201, 7105;4; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;PA5542, 010T;4; ,,, ARM Cortex-M4;STMicroelectronics;STM32F446;STM32F446, VET6 A, 7B892 VQ, PHL 7B 706, ST ARM;1; ,,, 5GHz LNA;RFMD;;>>>, 20, 5E5A;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/12/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B078WS7PHB |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Phicomm WLAN-2397 |rad1modif = PCIe (non-standard connector, oversize) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG, UE1723 P30, 360-26 3; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = 2167 |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Phicomm WLAN-2397 |rad2modif = PCIe (non-standard connector, oversize) |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG, UE1723 P30, 360-26 3; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 1000 |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Web GUI: http://p.to
*A1:"800002369 V1.0" is silkscreened on the main board. *A2:"800002432 V1.1" is silkscreened on the main board. *"800002372" is silkscreened on the LCD module board. *"800002397 V1.1" is silkscreened on the WLAN module board.
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4709 @1.4GHz (ARM Cortex-A9), RAM: 512MB :3.5" TFT LCD Display, "800002240 V1.0" WLAN (4T4R PA/LNA)
===Hardware Version=== *Phicomm K3 (A1) for China *Phicomm K3 (A2) for China *Phicomm K3 (B1) for non-China *Phicomm K3 (C1) for non-China
==See also== *[[Phicomm K3]] - AC3150 Smart Wi-Fi Router (2167+1000Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/121.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K3C A1|Phicomm K3C]] - AC1900 Smart Wi-Fi Router (1300+600Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/us/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/122.html PPage] :CPU: [[Lantiq (Intel)]] PXB4395EL @1.6GHz (GRX350), RAM: 256MB *[[Phicomm K2]] (PSG1218) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/65.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K2C]] (PSG1218) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/73.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K2P]] - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router (867+300Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/122.html PPage] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz, RAM: 128MB (DDR3), Flash: 64MB *[[Phicomm K2T]] - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router (867+300Mbps) • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/125.html PPage] *[[Phicomm KE 2P]] - AC1300 Dual Band Gigabit Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/us/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/124.html PPage] • [http://www.phicomm.com/ru/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/73.html PPage] *[[Phicomm KE 2M]] - AC1300 Dual Band Gigabit Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/ru/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/120.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K2 Mini]] (32MB) - N300 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/120.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K1]] (PSG1208) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/66.html PPage] *[[Phicomm K1S]] (PSG1208) - AC1200 Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.phicomm.com/cn/index.php/Products/family_details/cateid/18/id/68.html PPage]
